messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

new deploy not working via network deploy working via hello please log ticket regarding problem with os server assign responsible we cannot deploy images via back stick work please note we need issue fixed fast possible joiners assault next week alongside graduates if more info required please let know kind regards engineer ext

I'm currently sifting through the details of this ticket, trying to pinpoint the exact nature of the deployment failure. My current assessment leans towards the issue being tied to the deployment process itself rather than a fundamental hardware malfunction or access restriction.

I'm currently focusing on the core issue of "os server" deployment. The problem seems to stem from network and potentially USB-based image deployment failures, directly impacting new joiner onboarding, rather than a general hardware fault or access restriction.
